name: WinterChecklist Dev
postCreateCommand: set -e; apt-get update && apt-get install -y build-essential ca-certificates && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*; mkdir -p /work && cd /work && (git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/wowless/wowless.git || true); cd /work/wowless && git submodule update --init --depth 1 && cmake --preset default
